domino_project

Class MultiplayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.Board
      • domino_project.MultiplayerBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardCardinal, BoardHungarian

    public class MultiplayerBoard
extends Board
    This class represents a Multiplayer Board,a board for Multiplayer Type of Domino Games. It also extends Board.

    • Method Detail

      • fillBoard

        public void fillBoard()
        Fills the Set Of Tiles with 28 different Tiles with numbers in [0,6]. Every Tile exists only once.([0,0] [0,1] ...[6,5] [6,6]).

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Clears the board creating a new one.

      • giveLastTiles

        public SetOfTiles giveLastTiles(int x)
        Returns a SetOfTiles consisting of the x last Tiles of this SetOfTiles (represents the x Tiles from this SetOfTiles that are given to a player to play.(hand))
        Parameters:
        x - the number of Tiles that will be removed from this SetOfTiles and be added to the returned set.
        Returns:
        a SetOfTiles with x Tiles from this SetOfTiles.

      • addTileOnBeggining

        Adds a specified Tile(tile1) on the Beggining of this DominoLine.
        Parameters:
        tile1 - Tile to be added

      • addTileAtTheEnd

        public void addTileAtTheEnd(Tile tile1)
        Adds a specified Tile(tile1) at the end of the DominoLine.
        Parameters:
